newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - Apple up, but off peak.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - Apple up, but off peak.

text.p: Apple Computer Inc shares traded higher preceding Thursday's market open, but fell back from a peak reached in last night's after-hours trading.
Apple shares were active at 27-1/2 before the opening bell, up from 25-3/4 at Wednesday's Nasdaq close but below the 28-1/4 hit in after-hours trade last night.
Traders attributed the rise to Apple's announcement of an unexpected fiscal fourth quarter profit of $0.20 per share versus a profit of $0.48 per share.
The consensus Wall Street forecast for the period ended September 27 had been a loss of $0.30 per share.
